code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{createApi,fetchBaseQuery}from'@reduxjs/toolkit/dist/query/react';var initialState={id:0,address:'',phone_number:''};export var addressApiSlice=createApi({reducerPath:'addressApi',baseQuery:fetchBaseQuery({baseUrl:"/addresses"}),tagTypes:["addresses"],endpoints:function endpoints(builder){return{fetchAddresses:builder.query({query:function query(){return"/";},transformResponse:function transformResponse(response){return response.addresses;},providesTags:["addresses"]}),storeAddress:builder.mutation({query:function query(address){return{url:"/",method:"POST",body:{address:address.address,phone_number:address.phone_number}};},transformResponse:function transformResponse(response){return response;},invalidatesTags:["addresses"]})};}});var useStoreAddressMutation=addressApiSlice.useStoreAddressMutation,useFetchAddressesQuery=addressApiSlice.useFetchAddressesQuery;export{useStoreAddressMutation,useFetchAddressesQuery};export var addressSlice=createSlice({name:'addresses',initialState:initialState.address,reducers:{resetAddressSlice:function resetAddressSlice(state){state=initialState.address;}}});var resetAddressSlice=addressSlice.actions.resetAddressSlice;export{resetAddressSlice};export default addressSlice.reducer;
